name: WorkflowService
description: Defines service methods to query and manipulate the content of a workflow.

methods.name: Workflow
methods.description: Get the workflow entity for a given ID.

params.description: The identifier as per #getAllWorkflows of the root 'node'
params.name: rootWorkflowID

params.description: An optional node id if a subworkflow (contained in a meta node) is requested.
params.name: nodeID

methods.name: Node
methods.description: Get the node entity for a given root workflow and node ID.

params.description: The identifier as per #getAllWorkflows of the root workflow
params.name: rootWorkflowID

params.description: The node ID requested. If not present the root workflow node will be returned.
params.name: nodeID

methods.name: Workflow
methods.description: Trigger an update of the given workflow (@Martin, what's that mean?)

methods.name: WorkflowIDs
methods.description: Get a list of IDs for all known workflows within the given workflow group

params.description: The ID of the workflow group or 'root'
params.name: workflowGroupID

methods.name: WorkflowGroupIDs
methods.description: Get a list of IDs for all known workflow groups within the given workflow group

params.description: The ID of the workflow group or 'root'
params.name: workflowGroupID

methods.name: AllWorkflows
methods.description: Get a list of IDs for all known workflows
